product_name: e.l.f. CosmeticsFragrance Free Holy Hydration! Face Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVegane.l.f. SKIN's Holy Hydration! Face Cream - Fragrance Free is a lightweight, fragrance-free moisturizer that nourishes and plumps skin while delivering lasting hydration.
details: DetailsBenefitsReplenishes lost moisture for supple skinBrightens and evens out skin toneInstantly absorbs into skinFragrance-free formula great for sensitive skinFor all skin types: normal, combination, dry, oily, and sensitiveProud to be 100% vegan and cruelty-free, worldwide. Because kindness is chic.Key IngredientsHyaluronic Acid - Locks in moisture for a plump complexionNiacinamide - Minimizes pores and evens out skin tonePeptides - Promotes collagen and improves skin textureSqualene - Improves balance and elasticityVitamin B5 - Soothes and hydrates skinFormulated WithoutAll e.l.f. products are free from phthalates, parabens, nonylphenol ethoxylates, triclosan, triclocarban, and hydroquinoneAll skincare is also free from sulfatesItem 2563564How To UseGently massage a small amount of cream onto clean skin. Use in the morning alone, or follow with your favorite e.l.f. makeup. Can also be used at night after cleansing.IngredientsWater (Aqua), Isohexadecane, Stearyl Heptanoate, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Isopropyl Isostearate, Niacinamide, Cetearyl Olivate, Trehalose, Squalane, Dimethicone, Stearic Acid, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Silica, Sodium Hyaluronate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Panthenol (Vb5), Sorbitan Olivate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Polyethylene, Disodium EDTA, Polyacrylate-13, Polyisobutene, Polysorbate 20, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Carbomer.
how_to_use: Gently massage a small amount of cream onto clean skin. Use in the morning alone, or follow with your favorite e.l.f. makeup. Can also be used at night after cleansing.

reviews.headline: great ingredients and great price
reviews.comments: I really wanted to be in love with this but I have a "special need" that is not totally addressed with this cream. I have been experiencing dry flaky patches upon waking and late afternoon. This face cream has great ingredients and goes on nicely. It does not irritate but it's not hydrating enough for my dry patches. I have used several different Azelaic acid topicals for this issue and really need to find a better one. Perhaps if I do, this cream would be fine.

reviews.headline: Great cruelty-free product!
reviews.comments: I have used Elf products since their very beginning & am always amazed at how far the company has come!  This product is gentle, calming, moisturizing, afforable, & cruelty-free.  I use it in the AM after cleansing & under my sunscreen, & at night after cleansing my face.  It's a true winner!

reviews.headline: HYDRATES WELL! Love it.
reviews.comments: I was previously buying a moisturizer that hydrated my skin so well but was expensive. I tried many other products but nothing did the job until I tried this. I LOVE IT.

reviews.headline: My #1!
reviews.comments: I have been using this moisturizer consistently for about two years. It was the first moisturizer I bought when I decided to actually take my skincare seriously. Ever since then, it's been me and my elf moisturizer against the world! It has never let me down. Even as an oily skin girl, this product has never made me feel greasy and nasty. I can feel the softness and hydration in my skin even into the next day after I've used this product. The hydration really lasts!

reviews.headline: Love all things Elf, this face cream is no exception
reviews.comments: I bought this face cream because I'd been looking for an affordable moisturizer. I struggle with dryness around the mouth. I've been using it daily since purchasing. It's fragrance free (as advertised), and I haven't had any of that dryness since. Plus, it's cruelty free, which is a must for me. A little goes a long way. The packaging is great, and I love that it's recyclable.

reviews.headline: Great cruelty-free product!
reviews.comments: I have periodically used Elf products & remember when they first came out with only 1 product!  This face cream is wonderfully gentle, fragrance-free (a BIG plus!), cruelty-free, & full of good ingredients!  I use it both day & nite after cleansing & highly recommend it!

reviews.headline: I love it
reviews.comments: makes my skin feel so smooth

reviews.headline: Holy grail
reviews.comments: I wish ulta had the feature that could tell me how many tubs of this I have purchased. Its a staple in my routine and I always always come back to it. My skin is super dry and loves the hydration. I am able to use this morning and night! I love the smooth creamy texture, it absorbs into my skin perfectly!! 10/5!!!!

reviews.headline: Affordable Skin Care That Works!
reviews.comments: I love this product. It is cheap and effective.

reviews.headline: I actually love this
reviews.comments: I was using a sample I got from peach and Lilly for a while, I finally ran out, and found out the price and needed a more affordable option. This stuff feels sooo good, I have pretty dry skin, and it leaves it feeling so soft without being greasy like another one I got for $60! I love it. I've only got to try it twice so I'm praying there won't be any problems because I really really want to keep it as a staple in my routine ðŸ¥°

reviews.headline: I was hopeful :(
reviews.comments:
I don't tend to have sensitive skin. I've just moved to a new climate which means a new journey for the right moisturizer. After seeing all of the fantastic reviews, I had to try!
The texture is great and the fragrance free gets ðŸ‘ðŸ¼ ðŸ‘ðŸ¼  from me! I do really enjoy some other e.l.f. skincare. Unfortunately, this cream makes my face tingle and burn a bit. On to the next one...

reviews.headline: Really Nice Face Cream
reviews.comments: This is a really nice face cream - I wasn't sure what to expect I have never ventured into ELF skin care but this will definitely be a repeat purchase. It is really lightweight and not greasy it is really comfortable and there is NO SMELL which is even better for me. I like unscented face products. I had no issues with breakouts or anything when using this product. Love that it is also reasonably priced.

reviews.headline: So hydrating
reviews.comments: I usually buy the same face cream but it is really expensive and this product is a quarter of the price and is amazing. The cream is thick and so moisturizing. My skin loves it. Whoever thinks only the most expensive products work haven't tried this. Do your skin and wallet a favor and try for yourself!

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: Wanted to love this but it pills :(

reviews.headline: I love this face cream
reviews.comments: This is my second purchase of ELF face cream and I love how it feels on my face. It feels hydrating and it has a luxurious feel to the cream. It smooths out nicely and doesn't feel greasy. The price is pretty good too!

reviews.headline: I absolutely love this moisturizer
reviews.comments:
I am in my 40s a brown girl, I have always used Elf primers but nothing else from the brand. Recently started using  other products all excellent. 
     This is so hydrating , clear up my face and 
I look stunning. Skin bounced back to life .

reviews.headline: Irritating
reviews.comments: This product made my skin feel hydrated, but very itchy. It has niacinamide in it, which appears to be an irritant for sensitive skin. Sadly, I needed to discontinue use.

reviews.headline: This product saved my skin
reviews.comments: My skin has always been really sensitive and not the easiest to take care of I have a mix of dry and oily skin making it hard to take care of but this literally saved my skin and I will never go back. 1000% reccomend

reviews.headline: The good reviews must be paid/sponsored
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is really, really bad. One of the worst I've ever used. I've never left a review before, but I felt the need to get on here and tell everyone to save their time and money. For context, I have dry skin and moisturize twice a day. This moisturizer does nothing to actually hydrate the skin, and it immediately pills all over the face. In just trying to rub it in, with NO other products on my face, it pilled and did not absorb in the slightest. I had to go wash it off. Now I have to take the time to go return itâ€¦

reviews.headline: Got it for dry exema skin
reviews.comments: I originally purchased this for by husband to try for his dry skin on his face because of exema, but although he really likes the non greasiness it didn't really help him much so he went back to Aveeno, but I tried this and I love it. It truly love the way it makes my face feel soft and very hydrated. Now I use it as a bedtime routine of my face care. Love it!!!!

media.headline: DANGER Gave me perioral dermatitis around nose
media.caption: Look under my nose!!! And it's not acne, I haven't introduced any new products either. >:_(

media.headline: Not too happy with this product

faceoff_positive.comments: I received this product a month ago and happy I did. I've noticed a difference in the plumpness of my cheeks. I use it morning and night after cleansing and toning. The cream is thick but doesn't break me out or cause irritation anywhere on my face and neck. It also doesn't feel heavy on my oily/combination skin! 50g jar for the price it is isn't that bad. Although the packaging would be ideal if it came in a tube or with a different topper so air doesn't get in lessening the effectiveness of the ingredients.  The only scent of this product are the antioxidants. There is definitley no perfume smell! I would love if e.l.f. came out with a fragrance free under eye cream with the same benefits and added Spf 30 as this cream perhaps with added anti aging properties like a medical grade glycolic acid or hyluronic acid added to the mix? Just putting it out there...
faceoff_positive.headline: A great buy!

faceoff_negative.comments: I bought this about 2 months ago to replace my usual moisturizer and used it daily before applying my make up and on days when going make up free. I found after about 3 days of use, my skin stared to feel tight. This was relieved by putting on the moisturiser but would only stop the tightness for an hour or 2 before applying again. Just after a week I started to get dry scaly patches around my face that this moisturiser did nothing for. After 2 weeks of use, trying to give it as good as a chance as possible, I just had to stop and go back to my usual moisturiser. If you have dry skin that isn't easily managed and need a thirst quenching moisturiser, this isn't it as much as I wish it was.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not for sensitive or dry skin unfortunately

rollup.name: Fragrance Free Holy Hydration! Face Cream
